* Represents a Storage instance of Duke.
* A storage instance handles all communication between Duke and local data file.
* Storage object is constructed with an Ui instance.
* Ui object assists Storage in communicating with User.
* Returns TaskList instance after loading tasks from data file.

* Prints existing tasks in given TaskList instance.
* @param tasks TaskList object whose tasks will be printed.
Deadline task = new Deadline("This is a test Deadline task.", "2023/01/01 1000");
assertEquals("[D][ ] This is a test Deadline task. (by: 1 Jan 2023, 10:00 AM)", actualOutput);
Deadline task = new Deadline("This is another test Deadline task.", "2023/01/01 1000");
assertEquals("D,,0,,This is another test Deadline task.,,2023-01-01 1000", actualOutput);
ToDo task = new ToDo("This is a test ToDo task.");
assertEquals("[T][X] This is a test ToDo task.", actualOutput);
ToDo task = new ToDo("This is another test ToDo task.");
assertEquals("T,,1,,This is another test ToDo task.", actualOutput);
